LanguageData.VRE_ExtremeSkillLoss.label: екстремальна втрата навичок
LanguageData.VRE_ExtremeSkillLoss.description: Carriers of this gene forget skills twice as fast.
LanguageData.VRE_SevereSkillLoss.label: серйозна втрата навичок
LanguageData.VRE_SevereSkillLoss.description: Carriers of this gene forget skills 50% faster.
LanguageData.VRE_MinorSkillLoss.label: незначна втрата навичок
LanguageData.VRE_MinorSkillLoss.description: Carriers of this gene forget skills half as slow.
LanguageData.VRE_NoSkillLoss.label: без втрати навичок
LanguageData.VRE_NoSkillLoss.description: Carriers of this gene do not suffer from forgetting skills.
LanguageData.VRE_SkillDegradation.label: деградація навичок
LanguageData.VRE_SkillDegradation.description: Carriers of this gene suffer from forgetting skills regardless of their current skill level.
LanguageData.VRE_NoStudy.label: не здатний до навчання
LanguageData.VRE_NoStudy.description: Carriers of this gene are incapable of learning new skills.
